arn.description: ARN for AWS, URN for GOOGLE and ID for AZURE or K8S
arn.title: Arn

tags_filters.description: List of tags to filter resources by.
tags_filters.title: Tags Filters

git_ref.description: Git branch to pull rules from. Not used for GITHUB_RELEASE
git_ref.title: Git Ref

git_url.description: If not specified will be inferred from git_project_id. "https://api.github.com" will be used for GitHub, "https://git.epam.com" will be used for GitLab
git_url.title: Git Url

type.description: If not specified will be inferred from git_project_id.

job_type.description: Our inner job type. Used in SREJobs table.
job_type.title: JobType

version.description: Specific version to remove. * can be specified to remove all the versions of a specific ruleset
version.title: Version

force.description: Force the creation of a new ruleset version even if no there is no changes
force.title: Force

version.description: A version of the ruleset you want to update. If not specified, the latest previous ruleset will be used as base to update
version.title: Version

platforms.description: Platform for k8s rules to filter based on
platforms.title: Platforms

rule_source_id.description: Id of rule source object to get rules from. If the type of that source is GITHUB_RELEASE, the version from release tag will be used
rule_source_id.title: Rule Source Id

version.description: Ruleset version. If not specified, will be generated automatically based on github release of rules or based on the previous ruleset version
version.title: Version

overwrite.description: Determines whether to overwrite an existing ruleset version
overwrite.title: Overwrite

version.description: Specific version to release to LM. * can be specified to release all the versions of a specific ruleset. If not specified, the latest version will be released
version.title: Version

license_key.description: License to exhaust for this job. Will be resolved automatically unless an ambiguous occurs
license_key.title: License Key

name.description: Name for this scheduled entry. Will be generated if not provided. Must be unique within a customer
name.title: Name

job_type.title: JobType
